title: Hot Set Books I & II
description: This is the story of what happens when your husband doesn't treat you well, then you meet someone who does...Brought together for the first time, these two best-selling HOT SET titles tell the beautiful story of Australian film actress Kate and the unexpected flame that is ignited when on a film set with handsome Hollywood heartthrob, Rhys. Their attraction is immediate; the chemistry undeniable. However, Kate stays faithful to her husband, despite his jealousy and odd mood swings, but the hands of fate are determined throw Kate and Rhys together again. Set against their story is the ambitious, stunning Amelia who is dating Rhys and is determined to hold onto the only man she's ever loved, no matter the cost.Escape with this epic love story that transverses continents by taking the reader into the mystical Central Australian desert, to the modern city of Sydney, the blinding lights of Hollywood and breathtaking New Zealand.NOTE: This book is written in Australian English.
author: Kerry Northe
